item.title: High Fiber Diet for Business Not Expensive
item.description:
With business picking up, many companies are hitting a wall â€“ their internet connections can’t keep up with the increased data flow. The solution? A high-fiber diet for their network. Fiber optic cables are incredibly efficient. A single strand can handle massive amounts of voice, data, and video simultaneously, far exceeding the needs of most businesses. This capacity can be further multiplied by splitting the light into different wavelengths, each carrying gigabits per second...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/high-fiber-diet-for-business-not-expensive/
